title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen. The ControlExampleText should not produce a beep sound when SWT.MULTI is selected, but it currently does.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText produces a beep sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
